summary: Ted Gregory is trying to be the first black producer to mount a show on Broadway, but he has trouble with his star singer.
cast: Cora Green|Larry Seymour|Hazel Diaz|Alec Lovejoy|Amanda Randolph|Trixie Smith|Carman Newsome|Nat Reed|Sammy Gardiner|Dorothy Van Engle|Doli Armena|Columbus Jackson|George R. Taylor|Leon Gross|Consuelo Harris|Leon Gross & His Orchestra|The Tyler Twins
keywords: birmingham alabama|manhattan new york city|new york city|harlem manhattan new york city|black american
title: Swing!
